sections.heading: service; political activity; prohibited
sections.text: No person serving in the classified service under sections 23-1721 to 23-1736 shall actively participate in any campaign conducted by any candidate for public office while on duty or while in uniform.SourceLaws 1969, c. 140, ยง 16, p. 647;Laws 2003, LB 222, ยง 1

23-1736.Classified service; political activity; prohibited.

No person serving in the classified service under sections 23-1721 to 23-1736 shall actively participate in any campaign conducted by any candidate for public office while on duty or while in uniform.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 140, ยง 16, p. 647;Laws 2003, LB 222, ยง 12.
